Reviews.Content: somewhat concerned staying reviews im glad property try threenight stay recent business trip excellent clean comfortable surprisingly quiet staff friendly helpful location convenient meetings restaurants appreciate free bottles water replenished daily didnt free wireless internet own portable connection cant speak quality connection luxurious property found excellent value despite actually prefer westin times square dont middle times square property nicer chelsea conveniently located disappointment service 247 arrived 1am delayed flight bed hungry nevertheless definitely stay business pleasure
